channel.title: Vista Password Recovery?
channel.description:
So, i lost my password on my vista laptop. i cannot seem to remember what i changed it to :(. is there a way to change it?
Note: i have tried to use the password recovery with my flash drive and it doesn't seem to work.
Help is appreciated.

item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

i got it but, i screwed up my programs :(.Vista ftl

item.title: Vista Password Recovery?
item.dc:creator: @Not_X_A_Alex Not X A Alex
item.description:
@Not_X_A_Alex wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:10, topic:181357”][quote author=Not X A Alex link=topic=242859.msg2052854#msg2052854 date=1203011065]
http://ophcrack.sourceforge.net/
[/quote]

I was going to post that link, all you need to do is download the livecd (which won’t modify your computer) boot it up and it will crack your windows password, have fun. :D[/quote]
Well I looked back to that one thread were you posted this. I thought it would help so yeah

Read full topic

item.title: Vista Password Recovery?
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“Moparisthebest, post:12, topic:181357”][quote author=Swordskid61 link=topic=242859.msg2053214#msg2053214 date=1203034762]

http://ophcrack.sourceforge.net/

I was going to post that link, all you need to do is download the livecd (which won’t modify your computer) boot it up and it will crack your windows password, have fun.

There’s still the problem of i can’t get on the computer period. without the password i can’t even get to the desktop.
[/quote]

You don’t need to get into windows at all, download the livecd, burn it to a CD and boot it up (you will have to download and burn it on another computer of course.)[/quote]
Makes sense. i’ll try it.

Read full topic

item.title: Vista Password Recovery?

http://ophcrack.sourceforge.net/

I was going to post that link, all you need to do is download the livecd (which won’t modify your computer) boot it up and it will crack your windows password, have fun.
[/quote]

There’s still the problem of i can’t get on the computer period. without the password i can’t even get to the desktop.[/quote]

You don’t need to get into windows at all, download the livecd, burn it to a CD and boot it up (you will have to download and burn it on another computer of course.)

Read full topic

item.title: Vista Password Recovery?
item.dc:creator: @swordskid61 Swordskid61
item.description:
@swordskid61 wrote:

[quote=“davidude36, post:8, topic:181357”][quote author=Swordskid61 link=topic=242859.msg2052980#msg2052980 date=1203020401]

Alright then, explain reinstallation to me. i mean i have the cd and all but how run it when i cant get to the desktop?

put it in your cd drive, close your cd drive turn your computer off. turn it back on and when the pc is loading it will start installing or you will have to press f10 i think it is and boot from cd

Thanks i’ll try it when i get home. agh i have to re-install all 15 games i had on there D:
[/quote]
You’ll also lose any files you had. So it’d probably be better to just find a password finder tool.[/quote]
Problem: can’t get to desktop to run the password finder

Read full topic

item.title: Vista Password Recovery?
item.dc:creator: @davidude36 Brolapse
item.description:
@davidude36 wrote:

[quote=“Swordskid61, post:7, topic:181357”][quote author=error.login link=topic=242859.msg2052865#msg2052865 date=1203012086]

Alright then, explain reinstallation to me. i mean i have the cd and all but how run it when i cant get to the desktop?

put it in your cd drive, close your cd drive turn your computer off. turn it back on and when the pc is loading it will start installing or you will have to press f10 i think it is and boot from cd
[/quote]
Thanks i’ll try it when i get home. agh i have to re-install all 15 games i had on there D:[/quote]
You’ll also lose any files you had. So it’d probably be better to just find a password finder tool.

Read full topic
